card.name: Alphadios, Lord of Spirits
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. ■ Players can't summon creatures other than light creatures or cast spells other than light spells. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Admiral Queen
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Splash Queens. ■ Tap Ability

card.name: Necrodragon Belzarogue
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Bajula's Soul
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ The crossed creature gets +2000 power and breaks one more shield. ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone and put them into their graveyard.

card.name: Octillion Force
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ The crossed creature gets "power attacker +9000" and "triple breaker".

card.name: Aqua Patrol
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a player. That player shuffles all of their shields into their deck, then adds the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their shields face down.

card.name: Dorberos, the Imprisoning Fiend
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Non-darkness creatures cost 2 more to summon.

card.name: Metalchaos Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Accelerator

card.name: Sirius, the Patroller
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Whenever you generate a cross gear, you may draw a card. ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Valiant Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. ■ Metamorph

card.name: Petrial Flame
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they can't choose the crossed creature. ''(It can still be attacked or blocked.)''

card.name: Sharion, Hunter of the West Wind
card.text: ■ Your cross gear each cost 1 less to generate or cross. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Rinne Seuss, Sacred Weapon Guardian
card.text: ■ Saver: Cross Gear ''(When one of your Cross Gear would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.)''

card.name: Quick Defense
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ The crossed creature gets "blocker". ■ When the crossed creature is destroyed, you may cross this with one of your creatures For No Cost

card.name: Pakurio
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may look at your opponent's hand and add a card from it to their shields face down.

card.name: Gyulcas, Sage of the East Wind
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a cross gear from your deck, show that cross gear to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Inferno Scissors
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, you may destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 3000 or less.

card.name: Arissa, Vizier of Holy Strikes
card.text: ■ Accelerator

card.name: Magma Colossus
card.text: ■ Power Attacker ■ This creature attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Mysterious, Armed Soldier
card.text: ■ Accelerator

card.name: Red Ridaz', Explosive Daredevils
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have a '''Red Ridaz', Explosive Daredevil''' in your graveyard, choose a card in your opponent's mana zone and put it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Screw Rocket
card.text: ■ Choose one of your opponent's cross gear and put it into its owner's graveyard. ■ Metamorph

card.name: Full Throttle Sergeant
card.text: ■ Tap Ability
